rows.label: qst202802_msg0001
rows.name: Um...[ML:Dash ] I'm sorry. Are you okay?

rows.label: qst202802_msg0002
rows.name:
Of course I'm not okay, mo! I
had a terrible experience, mo!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0003
rows.name:
By the way, what were
you doing in the dirt?

rows.label: qst202802_msg0004
rows.name: It's not "you," mo! It's Mogumogu, mo!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0005
rows.name:
Mogumogu is searching for new
ores and is diligently
excavating day and night, mo!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0006
rows.name:
Mogumogu's intuition told me to search
for precious ores here, but...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202802_msg0007
rows.name:
there was a rockslide, and
I was buried alive, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0008
rows.name:
But thanks to you, I was
saved, mo. Thank you, mo!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0009
rows.name:
You're welcome. It was just
a coincidence, though...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202802_msg0010
rows.name:
More importantly, Mogumogu,
you said you were looking
for a new kind of ore.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0011
rows.name: That's right, mo!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0012
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]There are many precious
ores around here, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0013
rows.name:
You can even find the remains of
ancient creatures that have
crystallized in the ground, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0014
rows.name:
You're digging up remains?
That's a little creepy...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202802_msg0015
rows.name: Nia, it's not creepy at all...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202802_msg0016
rows.name:
When the bones of ancient creatures
petrify or crystallize, they
become very beautiful jewels.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0017
rows.name: Oh, is that so? I had no idea.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0018
rows.name:
Hey, Mogumogu, what kind of
ores have you discovered?

rows.label: qst202802_msg0019
rows.name:
You want to know, mo?
Well, not to brag, but...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202802_msg0020
rows.name:
Mogumogu has discovered
two new kinds of ore, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0021
rows.name: Two new kinds?!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0022
rows.name: Mogumogute and Himahistone, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0023
rows.name: Aren't those incredibly famous jewels?

rows.label: qst202802_msg0024
rows.name: I've definitely heard of Mogumogute.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0025
rows.name: You find it sometimes here in Invidia.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0026
rows.name:
Mogumogu! I want to find
a new kind of ore, too!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0027
rows.name:
Please! Teach me the secret
to finding new species!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0028
rows.name:
Hmm... Normally, I wouldn't
teach anyone, no matter
what they said, but...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202802_msg0029
rows.name:
Rock lovers are never bad
people, and what's more,
you saved my life, mo!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0030
rows.name:
So, I'll teach you the shortcut
to discovering new ores, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0031
rows.name: A shortcut?

rows.label: qst202802_msg0032
rows.name:
You can't find rare ores just
by collecting normally, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0033
rows.name:
You should look for clearly
suspicious rocky areas, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0034
rows.name:
I see...[ML:Dash ] I was always looking
for obvious rocky areas.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0035
rows.name:
You'll never find any that way, mo. The
quickest way is to investigate rocky areas
no one would think to look in, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0036
rows.name:
And one more thing. You need to
check if the rare ore you found
is really a new species, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0037
rows.name:
There's a jeweler named Milolo
at the Avaritia Trade Guild.
Milolo is also an appraiser, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0038
rows.name:
Mogumogu also has Milolo appraise
the stones he digs up, and then
Milolo buys them, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0039
rows.name:
Milolo's eye is the most
trustworthy in all of Alst, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0040
rows.name:
I see...[ML:Dash ] So, I should investigate
rocky areas no one looks in,
find a rare ore...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202802_msg0041
rows.name:
and then have Milolo-san in Avaritia
appraise it. That's the shortcut
to finding a new species.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0042
rows.name:
Finding a new species is a
battle with yourself, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0043
rows.name:
If you never give up, never throw in the
towel, and never lose hope until the very
end, you will surely obtain it, mo!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0044
rows.name:
I'm sure you, Menou,
can accomplish it, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0045
rows.name: Thank you, Mogumogu! I'll do my best!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0046
rows.name:
Ehehe...[ML:Dash ] Well then, Mogumogu
will get back to work, mo.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0047
rows.name:
Then let's pay a visit to Milolo-san
at the Avaritia Trade Guild.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0048
rows.name:
You're right. We should at least
introduce ourselves properly first.
